dialog.title: Layer Information
dialog.noData: No data available for this location

dialog.title: Upload file
dialog.disclaimer:
The upload function allows you to upload files with data in vector format.

The data to be uploaded must be in GeoJSON, GeoPackage, KML/KMZ or Shapefile format (the latter, being a multi-file format, must be packaged in a single .zip file with all parts inside, without using folders).

The vector data file must have the reference coordinate system (CRS) EPSG:4326. And it must be of Polygon geometry type, no other geometry type is allowed.

dropZone.title: Drop your file here or click to browse
dropZone.subtitle: Select a GeoJSON, KML, KMZ, or Shapefile (ZIP) to upload
